OOC: Yanshosh, you must of missed Menasors attack on Firearm, he shot at
him again. Also ,how big are IR and Prowl in the modes they are in.

BIC:
Menasor was still staring at his target. He didnt notice someong leaping at
him. As they grabbed his legs from behind he started to stumble, "Who
challenges Menasor" he yells, the voice booming around that area. Then the
second robot grabs him, and he starts to fall forward, "NO" he screams as
all 45 feet of metalic monster falls forward towards the rest of the
battling robots. His body becomes grounded, hitting the earth very hard,
causing huge rifts in the earth to go outwards. He lays motionless, close
to Firearm, and the rest of the battling factions.
